import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const NavBar = () => { var lastScrollTop; const navbar = document.getElementById('navbar'); window.addEventListener('scroll',function(){ var scrollTop = window.pageYOffset || document.documentElement.scrollTop; if(scrollTop > lastScrollTop){ navbar.style.top='-80px'; } else{ navbar.style.top='0'; } lastScrollTop = scrollTop; }); return (

Environnement et offres

Regards sur l'actualité
   
CONTACT
) } export default NavBar
